Colo-Serv Communications inc. make a promotion on virtual servers.
Registered Trademark in Canada.
We own our equipment and provide a quality and reliable service.

All our servers are located in our rooms in Canix Datacenter at Montreal.

Premium Bandwidth with many uplinks : Level3 - Tinet - NLayer and more.
All nodes are on our monitoring service 24/24.
